[[inst_hl_lui]]
==== HL.LUI

*Syntax:* hl.lui imm, ->{t, u, Rd}

*Description:* Load Upper Immediate: loads a 20-bit immediate into upper 20 bits of register.

*Encoding:*

image::../generated/encodings/enc_hl_lui.svg[HL.LUI encoding,width=800]

*Group:* ALU
